conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a real 3D cutaway massing with extruded walls, visible thickness, interior volume, and an angled/isometric-like view.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the rooms from the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (e.g., garage, multiple bedrooms, living/dining/kitchen suite, patios), indicating the 3D model represents only a small fragment of the floor plan.
Overall layout fidelity is not verifiable because the rendered 3D footprint and partitioning do not correspond to the full 2D plan’s room configuration and adjacencies.

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it is rejected because it omits the majority of rooms and does not represent the full 2D floor plan geometry.
